**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 128 1.1 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- This jagged, bony growth narrows to a sharp, pointed tip. Deep groves from some former battle scar its surface. The bearer of a _saurian spike_ often feels a sudden surge in power and confidence.
  • **Armor** You gain [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) with a range of 30 feet.
  • **Weapon** ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) When you cast a [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) spell by activating the spike, your battle form is exceptionally fearsome. Each enemy in a 30-foot emanation must succeed at a DC 27 Will saving throw or become [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical failure).
Saurian Spike **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 128 1.1 **Price** 700 gp --- Saurian Spike (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 128 1.1 **Price** 1,400 gp --- The range of the scent and fear emanation are both 60 feet. The save DC is 28. Saurian Spike (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 128 1.1 **Price** 6,500 gp --- The range of the scent and fear emanation are both 60 feet. The scent is [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) instead of imprecise, and creatures that fail their saves are frightened 2 (frightened 3 on a critical failure) with a DC 34 save.
name: Saurian Spike (Major)
